title: PeterS86
author: PeterS86
content: Ready to promote your business via video and audio platforms such as YouTube, TikTok,  Audible or Scribd?No matter if it's a long video, podcast, audiobook, or just a quick TikTok or YouTube short, we are here to grow your business!Huge 66% discount for the first 25 clients only! £5 per minute of video and £2 per minute of audio on ANY topic. Script, voiceover, subtitles & background music included for FREE if required!Example videos:TikTok format: https://youtu.be/swrqUx6qhhwYouTube format: https://youtu.be/SYUEIMYv1sU and https://youtu.be/Xv5rFM7JOZkInstagram format: https://youtu.be/P94wOJGJXjYPlease e-mail me at: peterschmidtz1986@gmail.com for more information. Our team will get in touch as soon as possible.3 Important Notes:- This offer applies only to your first order. Up to 10 projects for each client.- Each video can be up to 10 minutes. Audio has no limit.- Thumbnail is NOT included, price for that is £2.
